Articles.Content: I can see the imgur albums just fine, though it looks like the pictures are smaller than usual.

I can see the imgur albums just fine, though it looks like the pictures are smaller than usual.

Thanks Woopert, something funny going on here.

I think maybe there are too many pics on one page.

It was working fine before..

these are some really gorgeous craft, Majorjim! The Seaplane is so cool, I think I'm gonna make one. Partnership?

EDIT: Congrats! You're being featured in Zokesia's Adopt a Company Promotion! See it here:

these are some really gorgeous craft, Majorjim! The Seaplane is so cool, I think I'm gonna make one. Partnership?

Sure I can add your company! And yeah seaplanes are really fun to fly, you should definitely make one!

MJ

Did you make a thread for the Dragon Rider launch supporter? If so I will check it out. If not, can you make it please?

Yeah, it's not the new, new one. The new old one. Here's my Space X Dragon

I don't have plans to make the new, new one yet. Ive been very busy on a new KSP project. Will have a go after this ones finished.

And like so many others he has left
some of your imgur albums are empty, I really want that dreamchaser though, but i cant see pics.

some of your imgur albums are empty, I really want that dreamchaser though, but i cant see pics.

Hey man, yeah sorry I had to delete pics from Imgur to make room for the constellation album.

I'm not sure what to do about it as I don't want to have to pay to upgrade..

I will pare down some of the albums so at every album has at least two pics. The download link is still there.

And here is a link to the OP on this forum. The pics are still there.

Also, check out the 3 Kerbal Dream chaser further down the page. Its a bit more authentic.

MJ

Thanks, The 3 kerbal one looks really cool.

Dreamchaser; Check

CST-100 (my own, made with mod parts): Check

SDHI Orion SLS: Check

Now to decide if I want to get a SpaceX Dragon V2

Edited September 1, 2014 by TronX33
Hey, I followed your launch instructions, but after about 15 degrees, the whole rocket flips over uncontrollably. Really nice craft, thoough I may have to use my own KW launcher.

Hey, I followed your launch instructions, but after about 15 degrees, the whole rocket flips over uncontrollably. Really nice craft, thoough I may have to use my own KW launcher.

Hmm. The launcher wants to tip due to the large number of clipped surfaces in the dreamchaser.

Sadly thats the only way to make a lifting body at the moment.

I have flown it succsesfully many times, and it tipped when I was too forceful with the turn. Try little taps.

Also letting it get higher before turning can help.

You should make something like a propeller plane, For those are something to really show off.

Good luck, if you choose to accept my challenge!

You should make something like a propeller plane, For those are something to really show off.

Good luck, if you choose to accept my challenge!

Nah, its been done by Giggleplex already. I try to use design touches that nobody has done before.

'k, rep'ed and subscribed to. Probably should have done it already!

Rune. Looking good, BTW.

Cool thanks man.

Ok, I have added the Short SC-1 VTOL, Duna Constellation pack and the Curiosity rover and Atlas V 541.

Thanks!

MJ

Hi all,

I have added the Boeing X-37b.

Thanks!

MJ
Partnership with Moho Aeroworks? Your ships are.......awesome, and I"d also like to modify the X-37 for this: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boeing_X-40

MJ

These things are Beautiful! they must have taken ages to design and test !

do you take suggestions ? if so, can you please make a stock GSLV MK2 and MK 3 ?

do you take suggestions ?

I haven't done before but I am about to finish a craft and will be looking for things to make so I will see what I can do. And yes! I spend a long time testing and refining each craft, thank you!

MJ
